description: Do our fun quiz to find out how well you’re in the know
title: Do you know the truth about drugs and alcohol?
content:
Instructions

- You’ll need a piece of paper and a pen 
- Read each question, then write down the number of the question and then answer if you think it’s a MYTH or FACT next to it
- Click to the next page to see the answers 
- Add up how many questions you got right! For even more fun do the quiz with a friend then compare your scores

Questions 

1. Alcohol isn’t as bad for you as other drugs
2. Sleep helps the body to get rid of alcohol 
3. A pregnant woman who drinks alcohol is putting the health of her baby at risk
4. Drinking coffee does not help a person to sober up
5. Drinking alcohol makes you smarter 
6. Drugs help you to become more creative
7. Depression is a symptom of someone who is addicted to drugs
8. Smoking marijuana affects how you walk or run and it blurs your vision

How did you do? Click here to find out!
